quote: You can pour drinks on me. You can throw food at me... but for good reason or not, nobody hurts a friend of mine!
speaker: Shanks

quote: Only I can call my dream stupid!
speaker: Roronoa Zoro

quote: Scars on the back are a swordsman's shame.
speaker: Roronoa Zoro

quote: A man dies when people forget him!
speaker: Dr. Hiriluk

quote: There comes a time when a man must stand and fight. And that is when his friends' dreams are being laughed at!
speaker: Usopp

quote: Everyone has things they can do and cannot do. I'll do what you can't do, and you do what I can't do.
speaker: Sanji Vinsmoke

quote: The one who wins will rewrite the definition of right and wrong. They'll decide the future and how the past is written... The winner will define the meaning of justice!
speaker: Donquixote Doflamingo

quote: If we lose credibility just by admitting fault, then we didn't have any in the first place.
speaker: Admiral Fujitora

quote: If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.
speaker: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Bring on the hardship. It's preferred in a path of carnage.
speaker: Roronoa Zoro

quote: When times are tough, just laugh!
speaker: Nico Robin

quote: The government says your existence is a crime, but no matter what kind of weapons you may hold, just being alive isn't a sin! There's no crime in living!
speaker: Franky

quote: Being dead is never an apology.
speaker: Brook

quote: I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in the entire ocean is the pirate king.
speaker: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I am going to be the pirate king.
speaker: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Power isn't determined by your size, but by the size of your heart and dreams.
speaker: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I am going to save you even if it kills me.
speaker: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Say you want to live!
speaker: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I still have my friends!
speaker: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: There's a certain man I have to face. Until I see him, Death himself cannot touch me.
speaker: Roronoa Zoro

quote: You do what you can, the best that you can and then you turn to the others and expect the same from them.
speaker: Roronoa Zoro

quote: A crew with no respect and a captain that doesn't demand it is destined to fall apart quickly.
speaker: Roronoa Zoro

quote: If I give up now, I'm going to regret it.
speaker: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I'm gonna create a world where my friends can eat as much as they want.
speaker: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I don't care who you are! I will surpass you!
speaker: Monkey D. Luffy
